flawed_nl_solution:
Bella eats during the week, 6 apples/day * 7 days/week = <<6*7=24>>24 apples/week
Grace harvests 24 apples/week * 3 = <<24*3=72>>72 apples during the week.
Leftover after Bella eats, 72 apples/week - 24 apples/week = <<72-24=48>>48 apples/week.
After 6 weeks Grace will have 48 apples/week * 6 weeks = <<48*6=288>>288 apples.
#### 288

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 42, not 24. It appears two adjacent digits were swapped.
